Better than VeriSign!

----------
Don't forget to edit /etc/ssl/openssl.cnf...
BPs would probably be to use a different cnf for the CA

`./ca.sh <name your CA>`

`cd /root/<name of your CA>`

`<original dir>/openssl.sh <hostname key,csr,crt to sign> sign`

----------
